org.fcrepo.connector.file

Class FedoraFileSystemConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.Connector
      • org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.WritableConnector
        • org.modeshape.connector.filesystem.FileSystemConnector
          • org.fcrepo.connector.file.FedoraFileSystemConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.Pageable

    public class FedoraFileSystemConnector
extends org.modeshape.connector.filesystem.FileSystemConnector
    This class extends the FileSystemConnector to enable the autocreation of Fedora-specific datastream and content properties.
    Author:
    Andrew Woods Date: 1/30/14

    • Method Detail

      • getDocumentById

        public org.infinispan.schematic.document.Document getDocumentById(String id)
        This method returns the object/document for the node with the federated arg 'id'.

        Additionally, this method adds Fedora datastream and content properties to the result of the parent class implementation.

        Overrides:
        getDocumentById in class org.modeshape.connector.filesystem.FileSystemConnector
